short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CNN International News in your browser. All CNN news in one place. We'll follow CNN website 24/7 and let you know when news appears

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CNN International News Notifier for Chrome. This browser extension checks CNN International news section of the edition.cnn.com website 24/7. As soon any news come up it sends you a notification right to your browser.

This is the best way to follow all news and stay informed without checking the CNN website dozens of times a day. Get the notifier and follow up:
-	Breaking news
-	US and World News
-	Weather
-	Entertainment
-	Politics
-	Health

The main feature of CNN International News Notifier is helping you to relax while following all major news and events without missing anything important.

-	No disturbing or annoying push notifications
-	No ads or teasers
-	Only breaking news and really important info

View the latest news and breaking news today for US, world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN.com
